post:
SupremeBytes, LLC was founded in February of 2010 in Columbus, Ohio with one goal in mind: good service and support at a fair price. From day one, our focus has been to provide support from the bottom up, while creating a stable, secure and reliable infrastructure for our clients.

What is Included?
* Server location: Los Angeles
* All servers connected have 1000Mbps network connectivity
* The servers are unmanaged, and you should manage it by yourself, but we will help you as much as we can.
* All of the Servers include 1 IPv4, and 2 IPv6 addresses. You can order more if you need.
* Full native IPv6 support

* Datacenter Location: Quadranet's Los Angeles Penthouse

Package OVZ-128
* Guaranteed Ram : 128 Mb
* Hard Drive : 10 GB
* Bandwidth : 256 GB Monthly
* Port Speed : 1000Mbps
* IP Addresses : 1 IPv4 | 2 IPv6
* Price : $12.00 Annually
Order Now

Need more resources? We offer bigger packages: http://www.supremebytes.com/virtual-private-servers.php



Extra IPv4 addresses are $1.00 monthly or $12.00 annually.

Questions? Ask our sales department! sales@supremebytes.com or our website's live chat.

Order our Virtual Private Servers: http://www.supremebytes.com/virtual-private-servers.php


Terms of Service: http://www.supremebytes.com/terms-of-service.php

Accepted payment types: PayPal and 2Checkout
